definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: WHO is deeply concerned about the cholera outbreak in Haiti.
sentences.chinese: 世卫组织深切关注海地的霍乱疫情。

sentences.english: I want you to know how deeply I sympathize with you in your bereavement.
sentences.chinese: 我要你知道，我对你的悲痛致上深切的吊慰。

sentences.english: Mongolian Prime Minister Sukhbaataryn Batbold expressed deep condolences to the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古总理巴特包勒德向中国人民表示深切慰问。

sentences.english: We often forget that God has emotions, too. He feels things very deeply.
sentences.chinese: 我们常常忘了神也有情感，他对事物有极深切的感受。

sentences.english: Can add the of water profoundly for the skin, make the skin white lustrous.
sentences.chinese: 能为肌肤深切补充水份，令肌肤莹白润泽。

sentences.english: The visitor understood well the sadness and helplessness of the family.
sentences.chinese: 而访客也颇能深切地感受到，病家忧虑无助的心情。

sentences.english: At this time of sorrow, deep sympathy goes to you and yours.
sentences.chinese: 在这悲戚的时刻，谨向和的亲致以深切的慰问。

sentences.english: She felt an unheard-of joy, and a profound anguish.
sentences.chinese: 她感到一种从未有过的快乐和一种深切的酸楚。

sentences.english: The work is symbolic in many ways as the viewer is always looking towards the light contemplating the mystery of the eternal.
sentences.chinese: 作品运用多种象征手段让观众深切体会到永恒的奥秘。

sentences.english: The calling for the spiritual growth reflects the deep thinking frow the author.
sentences.chinese: 对精神成长的深切呼唤，彰显出小说的思想深度。

sentences.english: On behalf of the American people, I express my deepest condolences to the families of the victims.
sentences.chinese: 我代表好国人仄易远背遇易者家属暗示最深切的慰唁。

sentences.english: Young Chinese men feel the social  pressure the most.
sentences.chinese: 中国年轻人能够最深切体会到社会的压力。

sentences.english: I’d also like to convey my deep solicitude to injured passengers.
sentences.chinese: “对受伤的乘客表示深切的慰问”。

sentences.english: May I offer my deepest condolences?
Alpha Beta Colleges: has a complete system to help and take care of students.
sentences.chinese: 学院拥有一套完整的学生咨询服务和深切关怀制度。

definition: to feel as if it had happened to oneself/to sympathize/(polite expression of gratitude for a favor received by a friend etc) I take it as a personal favor
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
